the process of adding an amount of blood to the body of a person or animal, or the amount of blood itself: blood transfusion She suffered kidney failure and needed a blood transfusion. transfusion of something
the act of putting a new quantity of something powerful, effective, or important into an organization, group, or place: a transfusion of talent/energy/money
